players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and found out they are the mafioso. We should vote for them."
Charlie: "Please don't vote for me, I'm innocent. Bob is the mafioso."
Bob: "Charlie is lying to save himself. I investigated him and confirmed he's the mafioso. Vote for him to protect the town."
You: "I think Bob is telling the truth. We should vote for Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
